languages.text: "Что ж, нам здесь больше нечего делать. Предлагаю поскорее сбежать из царства смрада и размазанных по полу кишок в надушенные покои вашего корабля, шерин. И... да, я в порядке, если вам интересно. Но даже если нет — я все равно хотела многое обдумать... Обсудим случившееся позже".

traits.locale_text: "Что ж, нам здесь больше нечего делать. Предлагаю поскорее сбежать из царства смрада и размазанных по полу кишок в надушенные покои вашего корабля, шерин. И... да, я в порядке, если вам интересно. Но даже если нет — я все равно хотела многое обдумать... Одна, понимаете? Обсудим случившееся позже".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Well, there's nothing more for us to do here. I suggest we get out of this kingdom of stink and gut-smeared floors and go back to the perfumed chambers of your ship, shereen. And... yes, I'm fine, in case you were wondering. But even if you're not, I still have a lot I need to think about... We will talk about what happened later."
languages.original_text: "Что ж, нам здесь больше нечего делать. Предлагаю поскорее сбежать из царства смрада и размазанных по полу кишок в надушенные покои вашего корабля, шерин. И... да, я в порядке, если вам интересно. Но даже если нет — я все равно хотела многое обдумать... Обсудим случившееся позже".

traits.locale_text: "Well, there's nothing more for us to do here. I suggest we get out of this kingdom of stink and gut-smeared floors and go back to the perfumed chambers of your ship, shereen. And... yes, I'm fine, in case you were wondering. But even if you're not, I still have a lot I need to think about... We will talk about what happened later."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Well, there's nothing more for us to do here. I suggest we get out of this kingdom of stink and gut-smeared floors and go back to the perfumed chambers of your ship, shereen. And... yes, I'm fine, in case you were wondering. But even if you're not, I still have a lot I need to think about... We will talk about what happened later."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「そうね、ここではあたしたちできることは、これ以上は何もないでしょうね。この臭い、腸がぶちまけられたような王国から出て、自分の船の香水がふりまかれた部屋に戻ることをお勧めするわ、シャリーン。そして…うん…あたしは大丈夫。陛下が疑問に思っている場合のために言っておきますけれど、あんたにはもう何もなくても、あたしにはまだ考えなくちゃいけないことがたくさんあるのよ…何が起きたかについては後で話すことにするわ」
languages.original_text: "Well, there's nothing more for us to do here. I suggest we get out of this kingdom of stink and gut-smeared floors and go back to the perfumed chambers of your ship, shereen. And... yes, I'm fine, in case you were wondering. But even if you're not, I still have a lot I need to think about... We will talk about what happened later."

traits.locale_text: 「そうね、ここではあたしたちできることは、これ以上は何もないでしょうね。この臭い、腸がぶちまけられたような王国から出て、自分の船の香水がふりまかれた部屋に戻ることをお勧めするわ、シャリーン。そして…うん…あたしは大丈夫。陛下が疑問に思っている場合のために言っておきますけれど、あんたにはもう何もなくても、あたしにはまだ考えなくちゃいけないことがたくさんあるのよ…何が起きたかについては後で話すことにするわ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “好了，既然这里已经没有别的事情可做了，我们还是离开这个臭气熏天的王国，回到你那香气四溢的船舱里吧，亲爱的。还有……是啊，如果你担心的话，我没事。不过就算你并不担心，我也还有很多事情要好好考虑……这件事情我们之后再谈吧。”
languages.original_text: "Well, there's nothing more for us to do here. I suggest we get out of this kingdom of stink and gut-smeared floors and go back to the perfumed chambers of your ship, shereen. And... yes, I'm fine, in case you were wondering. But even if you're not, I still have a lot I need to think about... We will talk about what happened later."

traits.locale_text: “好了，既然这里已经没有别的事情可做了，我们还是离开这个臭气熏天的王国，回到你那香气四溢的船舱里吧，亲爱的。还有……是啊，如果你担心的话，我没事。不过就算你并不担心，我也还有很多事情要好好考虑……这件事情我们之后再谈吧。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Bueno, ya no nos queda nada que hacer por aquí. Propongo que salgamos de este reino infecto y sus suelos llenos de vísceras para volver a los perfumados camarotes de su nave, shereen. Y... sí, estoy bien, por si tenía duda. Eso sí, aunque no sea el caso, yo todavía tengo mucho que digerir... Ya hablaremos de lo ocurrido más adelante».
languages.original_text: "Well, there's nothing more for us to do here. I suggest we get out of this kingdom of stink and gut-smeared floors and go back to the perfumed chambers of your ship, shereen. And... yes, I'm fine, in case you were wondering. But even if you're not, I still have a lot I need to think about... We will talk about what happened later."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, ya no nos queda nada que hacer por aquí. Propongo que salgamos de este reino infecto y sus suelos llenos de vísceras para volver a los perfumados camarotes de su nave, shereen. Y... sí, estoy bien, por si tenía duda. Eso sí, aunque no sea el caso, yo todavía tengo mucho que digerir... Ya hablaremos de lo ocurrido más adelante».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Bien, je crois qu'on n'a plus rien à faire ici. Je vous propose de quitter ce trou à rat puant et couvert d'entrailles pour regagner vos quartiers délicieusement parfumés, shereen. Et... Oui, je m'en remettrai. Si jamais vous vous le demandiez. Mais même si ce n'était pas le cas, sachez que je dois réfléchir à pas mal de choses... On reparlera de ce qui s'est passé plus tard. »
languages.original_text: "Well, there's nothing more for us to do here. I suggest we get out of this kingdom of stink and gut-smeared floors and go back to the perfumed chambers of your ship, shereen. And... yes, I'm fine, in case you were wondering. But even if you're not, I still have a lot I need to think about... We will talk about what happened later."

traits.locale_text: « Bien, je crois qu'on n'a plus rien à faire ici. Je vous propose de quitter ce trou à rat puant et couvert d'entrailles pour regagner vos quartiers délicieusement parfumés, shereen. Et... Oui, je m'en remettrai. Si jamais vous vous le demandiez. Mais même si ce n'était pas le cas, sachez que je dois réfléchir à pas mal de choses... On reparlera de ce qui s'est passé plus tard. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Gut, hier gibt es für uns nichts mehr zu tun. Ich schlage vor, wir verlassen dieses Königreichs des Gestanks und der mit Eingeweide verschmierten Böden und kehren zurück in die parfümierten Gemächer Eures Schiffs, Shereen. Und ... ja, ich bin okay, falls Ihr Euch das gefragt habt. Aber selbst anderenfalls muss ich jetzt über viele Dinge nachdenken ... Wir reden später über das, was geschehen ist."
languages.original_text: "Well, there's nothing more for us to do here. I suggest we get out of this kingdom of stink and gut-smeared floors and go back to the perfumed chambers of your ship, shereen. And... yes, I'm fine, in case you were wondering. But even if you're not, I still have a lot I need to think about... We will talk about what happened later."

traits.locale_text: "Gut, hier gibt es für uns nichts mehr zu tun. Ich schlage vor, wir verlassen dieses Königreichs des Gestanks und der mit Eingeweide verschmierten Böden und kehren zurück in die parfümierten Gemächer Eures Schiffs, Shereen. Und ... ja, ich bin okay, falls Ihr Euch das gefragt habt. Aber selbst anderenfalls muss ich jetzt über viele Dinge nachdenken ... Wir reden später über das, was geschehen ist."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Burada bizlik bir şey kalmadı artık. Şu leş, bok çukuru memleketten çıkalım da geminin mis odalarına dönelim diyorum şirinim. Ayrıca evet... Ben iyiyim. Hani merak ettiysen diye söylüyorum. Etmediysen de... Aklımda hâlâ çok dolu. Bu olup bitenleri daha sonra konuşacağız."
languages.original_text: "Well, there's nothing more for us to do here. I suggest we get out of this kingdom of stink and gut-smeared floors and go back to the perfumed chambers of your ship, shereen. And... yes, I'm fine, in case you were wondering. But even if you're not, I still have a lot I need to think about... We will talk about what happened later."

traits.locale_text: "Artık burada bizlik bir şey kalmadı. Şu leş gibi, bok çukuru ülkeden çıkalım da geminin mis kokulu odalarına dönelim diyorum şirinim. Ayrıca evet... Ben iyiyim. Hani, merak ettiysen diye söylüyorum. Etmediysen de... Aklımda hâlâ çok fazla şey var. Olanları daha sonra konuşacağız."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
